short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy Access to YouTube via Sidebar UI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sidebar for YouTube™ is an extension that gives you access to YouTube via the sidebar window.

Note: YouTube is a trademark of Google Inc. Sidebar for YouTube™ is an unofficial addon and does NOT belong or relate to Google and YouTube at all. This addon is developed and maintained independently by its author.

To work with this addon, please press the toolbar button to open the sidebar. Within the sidebar window, there is a toolbar with a few buttons at the top. To open the current video in a new tab, please press the pop-out button at the top toolbar. There are also buttons for back, forward, and reload.

Note: to report bugs, please fill out the bug report form on addon's homepage (https://mybrowseraddon.com/youtube-sidebar.html).
